title: Messages
description: SMS/MMS management screen for viewing and analyzing text message communications

features.name: Message List Display
features.description: Show all SMS and MMS messages with sender, timestamp, and content preview
features.developer_perspective: Critical for testing messaging apps and communication features

features.name: Message Content Viewer
features.description: Display full message content including attachments for MMS
features.developer_perspective: Essential for debugging message formatting and attachment handling

features.name: Conversation Thread View
features.description: Group messages by conversation for easier analysis
features.developer_perspective: Useful for testing messaging flow and conversation management

features.name: Message Search and Filter
features.description: Search messages by content, sender, or date range
features.developer_perspective: Helpful for finding specific test messages and debugging
